Download

SevenuP v1.20

Windows Version (packed) (unpacked)
  

Works under Windows 95, 98, 98SE, ME, 2000 and XP. It should also work with other Win32 versions (NT, 2003, Vista), it hasn't just been tested or reported. The packed version has a smaller executable size, but some bad antivirus programs can give false positives.

Linux Version

Dynamic version, so you'll need wxWidgets 2.6.2 (or later) libraries, and also GTK2.x. This version was compiled under Gentoo 2006.0, and includes both 32 (x86) and 64 (x86_64) bits versions. If it gives you any problem or you just prefer to compile your own code, better download the source code.

FreeBSD Version

Dynamic version, so you'll need wxWidgets 2.6.2 (or later) libraries, and also GTK2.x. If it gives you any problem or you just prefer to compile your own code, better download the source code.

Macintosh Version

This version has been compiled for MacOS X 10.2.8, and also tested with versions 10.3.9 and 10.4.11.

Source code

You'll need it if you want to compile your own SevenuP (specially useful to Unix users who can't run any of the versions already compiled), or see how was it done, add new features, fix bugs...

WIP Source code

Fixing Unicode and GCC 4.0 compilation.
